entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High 8. POP 40%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 40 percent chance of flurries near noon. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 70. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Rain showers or flurries at times heavy beginning early this evening then changing to flurries at times heavy later this evening and ending this evening then 30 percent chance of flurries late this evening and after midnight. Clearing before morning. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 20 after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM EDT Wednesday 29 March 2023
